text: Miguel Droguett (born 8 May 1961) is a Chilean former cyclist. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Chile Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Santiago Category:Pan American Games medalists in cycling Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Chile Category:Cyclists at the 1991 Pan American Games
title: Miguel Droguett
